flowRoot.flowPara: Enumerate devices upon driver start and hotplug
Legacy Magellen protocol window. deprecated. X11, Windows, mac.
Much research and thought needs to put into this list of events. Some need to keep the device and interface in sync. Others are just notifications. These will be dependent on the device.
Motion Event, Back to raw data
Helper functions for raw motion data to camera manipulation
Strategy for visual lag. When the display can't keep up with the speed of the spaceball events.
should we build transformation matrices and combine?
Should we just average each axes values?
Should we just store the latest value and drop unsent packets?
